titles: The popes dreadfull curse being the form of an excommunication of the Church of Rome : taken out of the leger-book of the Church of Rochester now in the custody of the dean and chapter there / writ by Ernulfus the Bishop.
author: Ernulf, Bishop of Rochester, 1040-1124.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by L.C. ...,
notes: Attributed to Ernulf by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
